title: The_$ims_3_by_greg
description:
The Sims 3 was developed by The Sims Studio as a strategic life simulation game for computer game. It was published by EA (Electronic Arts) in 2009. The Sims 3 is the follow-up to the best-selling prequel, The Sims 2. At first, The Sims 3 was published on June 2, 2009 for both Windows and OS X at once. Both versions are available on the same disc.
